timeline.message: Apply offset on optimized SELECT DISTINCT queries

timeline.bodyText:
testSelectCountStarIsOptimizedInsideRelations failed with:
java.lang.AssertionError: 
Expected: a value less than or equal to <8388608L>
     but: <24224152L> was greater than <8388608L>
	at __randomizedtesting.SeedInfo.seed([A1199D5560FEB506:3485992BF20EF71E]:0)
	at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:18)
	at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:6)
	at io.crate.testing.MemoryLimits.assertMaxBytesAllocated(MemoryLimits.java:46)
	at io.crate.planner.operators.LogicalPlannerTest.plan(LogicalPlannerTest.java:69)
	at io.crate.planner.operators.LogicalPlannerTest.testSelectCountStarIsOptimizedInsideRelations(LogicalPlannerTest.java:221)

Not sure why this increased in that particular case, because that isn't even affected by the other changes in this PR. Will follow up on this separately.
